name: Mystery P.I. - The Vegas Heist
summary:
The heist of the century has just happened!  You've been hired by the casino to find and return the stolen money before its grand opening in 16 hours. Search for over 2300 cleverly hidden objects in 25 intriguing locations to solve the Vegas Heist. 
 
Two addictive ways to play: Vegas Heist mode and Unlimited Seek & Find mode. Collect all the hidden Keys and Poker Chips to unlock the bonus mode.  Find the clues, solve the Vegas Heist.
